classData.comment:
/**
 * @class Neo.component.Base
 * @extends Neo.core.Base
 */
classData.name: Base

classData.comment:
/**
     * Valid values for hideMode
     * @member {String[]} hideModes=['removeDom','visibility']
     * @protected
     * @static
     */
classData.description: Valid values for hideMode
classData.name: hideModes

classData.comment:
/**
     * True automatically applies the core.Observable mixin
     * @member {Boolean} observable=true
     * @static
     */
classData.description: True automatically applies the core.Observable mixin
classData.name: observable

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} className='Neo.component.Base'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: className

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} ntype='component'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: ntype

classData.comment:
/**
         * The name of the App this component belongs to
         * @member {String|null} appName_=null
         */
classData.description: The name of the App this component belongs to
classData.name: appName_

classData.comment:
/**
         * True automatically mounts a component after being rendered.
         * Use this for the top level component of your app.
         * @member {Boolean} autoMount=false
         * @tutorial 02_ClassSystem
         */
classData.description:
True automatically mounts a component after being rendered.
Use this for the top level component of your app.
classData.name: autoMount

classData.comment:
/**
         * True automatically renders a component after being created inside the init call.
         * Use this for the top level component of your app.
         * @member {Boolean} autoRender=false
         * @see {@link Neo.component.Base#init init}
         * @tutorial 02_ClassSystem
         */
classData.description:
True automatically renders a component after being created inside the init call.
Use this for the top level component of your app.
classData.name: autoRender

classData.comment:
/**
         * CSS selectors to apply to the root level node of this component
         * @member {String[]} baseCls=[]
         */
classData.description: CSS selectors to apply to the root level node of this component
classData.name: baseCls

classData.comment:
/**
         * Bind configs to model.Component data properties.
         * Example for a button.Base:
         * @example
         * bind: {
         *     iconCls: data => `fa fa-{$data.icon}`,
         *     text   : data => data.foo.bar
         * }
         * @see https://github.com/neomjs/neo/blob/dev/examples/model
         * @member {Object|null} bind=null
         */
classData.description:
Bind configs to model.Component data properties.
Example for a button.Base:
classData.name: bind

classData.comment:
/**
         * Custom CSS selectors to apply to the root level node of this component
         * You can override baseCls to remove default selectors.
         * @member {String[]} cls_=null
         */
classData.description:
Custom CSS selectors to apply to the root level node of this component
You can override baseCls to remove default selectors.
classData.name: cls_

classData.comment:
/**

classData.description: manager.Focus will change this flag on focusin & out dom events
classData.name: containsFocus_

classData.comment:

classData.description:
Convenience shortcut to access the data config of the closest model.Component.
Read only.

classData.description: An array of domListener configs

dropZone
dropZoneConfig

Internal flag for vdom changes after a component got unmounted
(delta updates can no longer get applied & a new render call is required before re-mounting)

/**
     * Find an instance stored inside a config via optionally passing an ntype.
     * Returns this[configName] or the closest parent component with a match.
     * Used by getController() & getModel()
     * @param {String} configName
     * @param {String} [ntype]
     * @returns {Neo.core.Base|null}
     */
